thread.title: Meryl Streep Just Tripped on Red Carpet - Meryl Streep Falls on Oscars Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Meryl Streep Just Tripped on the Oscars Red Carpet - Meryl Streep Falls on Oscars 2017 Red Carpet

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Meryl Streep Just Tripped on Red Carpet - Meryl Streep Falls on Oscars Red Carpet

organizations.name: red carpet - meryl streep falls on oscars red carpet meryl streep

text:
Meryl Streep, Queen of the Oscars, can look flawless even when she's stumbling on the red carpet. The Best Actress nominee made her entrance to tonight's awards ceremony smiling at the crowd, sparkling in a dark blue Ellie Saab couture look, but got carried away and tripped on the hem of her dress. Don't worry, she recovered instantly (as Meryl does) and continued to strut towards the Dolby Theater. Jennifer Lawerence isn't the only one who can look good falling at the Oscars.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Watch the moment below.
Meryl Streep is The New Jennifer Lawrence #Oscars pic.twitter.com/oM88HLEkSc
